doc.after: Water gardens also known as aquatic gardens backyard ponds and garden ponds have become popular in recent years Usually referring to a man made feature these gardens typically combine a pool with aquatic plants and often ornamental fish Fixed items such as rocks fountains statuary waterfalls and watercourses can be combined with the pool to add visual interest and integration with the local landscape and environment
